channel.title: A question about timer/player
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone would be able to explain to me how to make a timer that is based on players. What I meant is example an area where 1 player would be 2 minutes, but if it's 2 players the timer is increased to example 4 minutes.
Can anyone please explain this to me.
Thank you
